name: Flaah Orbitals
subtitle: Arborec Monument
ability: When you pass, place 1 infantry on a planet in or adjacent to this system other than Mecatol Rex that contains no other player's units. Then, gain control of that planet, if able.

name: Phoenix Cauldron
subtitle: Argent Monument
ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to destroy 1 damaged ship in or adjacent to this system.

name: Platine Obelisk
subtitle: Letnev Monument
ability:
When you exhaust this planet to cast votes, you may cast an additional number of votes equal to the number of your non-fighter ships in this system.

Double the PRODUCTION values of your units in this system.

name: Beacon of Ragh
subtitle: Saar Monument
ability: This system is adjacent to your flagship.

name: Pharus Iustitiae
subtitle: Keleres Monument
ability:
After a law enters play, add a command token from your reinforcements to this card.

When you would place a command token in this or an adjacent system, you may place that token from this card instead.

name: Glory Furnace
subtitle: Muaat Monument
ability:
When you exhaust this planet to cast votes:

For each war sun or flagship you control in this system, and for each adjacent supernova, cast 2 additional votes or produce 1 hit against another player's ships in a system adjacent to this planet.

name: Mowshir Freeport
subtitle: Hacan Monument
ability:
As part of a transaction, one player may return any of their ships in or adjacent to this system to their reinforcements.

For each of those ships, the other player produces 1 ship of that type in this system without spending resources.

name: The Panopticon
subtitle: Empyrean Monument
ability:
This unit is placed in the space area of any system that is not an anomaly and does not contain planets, instead of on a planet.

If this unit is blockaded, destroy it.

name: The Cenotaph
subtitle: Sol Monument
ability: When you place 1 or more infantry on a planet, exhaust this card to place up to 4 of those infantry on this planet instead.

name: Revenance Circuit
subtitle: Creuss Monument
ability:
After a player activates this system:

For each system adjacent to this planet that contains a wormhole, you may produce 1 hit against another player's ships in that system.

subtitle: L1Z1X Monument
ability: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust this card to take a player's command token from an adjacent system and place it in this system, if it does not already contain that player's command token.

name: Spire Of Ixth
subtitle: Mahact Monument
ability: At the start of the status phase, the Mahact player may place 1 command token in this system into their fleet pool, if it does not already contain that player's token.

name: Erwan's Fist
subtitle: Mentak Monument
ability: When a player activates this system, you may take 1 of their unscored secret objective cards at random, if able. If you do, give that player 1 of your unscored secret objective cards.

name: Nefishh Projector
subtitle: Naalu Monument
ability:
During the agenda phase, when an outcome you voted for is resolved:

Place up to 2 fighters from your reinforcements in this or an adjacent system. If that system contains another playerâ€™s ships, immediately resolve
a space combat.

name: Quantum Reliquary
subtitle: Naaz-Rokha Monument
ability: When you are negotiating a transaction with a player who controls units in or adjacent to this system, 1 of your relics can be exchanged as part of that transaction.

name: Valefar Assimilator W
subtitle: Nekro Monument
ability: When you gain control of a planet that contains another player's structure, you may place the "W" assimilator token on that player's monument card. While that token is on a monument card, this card gains that card's attributes, abilities, and ability text.

name: Lodestar
subtitle: Nomad Monument
ability: At the start of your turn, you may return this unit to your reinforcements. If you do, produce your flagship in this system without spending resources.

name: G'hom Firefly Beacon
subtitle: Norr Monument
ability: When you place your monument, place 1 infantry on this planet, and a total of 2 infantry on up to 2 other planets you control in adjacent systems.

name: Scepter Of Ul
subtitle: Ul Monument
ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to remove an attachment from a planet you control and attach it to a planet you control with the same planetary trait in this or an adjacent system.

name: Calm Seas Sanatorium
subtitle: Jol-Nar Monument
ability:
After an agenda outcome you voted for or predicted is resolved:

Place up to 2 infantry on a planet you control in this system.

name: She Consumes Worlds
subtitle: Vuil'raith Monument
ability: DEPLOY: When you gain control of a planet, you may place this unit on that planet and capture every other structure on that planet.

name: The Imperial Vault
subtitle: Winnu Monument
ability:
At the start of the agenda phase: 

If your monument is on the game board, gain any number of trade goods on this card. Otherwise, spend any number of resources to place 1 trade good from the supply on this card for every 3 resources spent.

name: Qanoj Shield Array
subtitle: Xxcha Monument
ability: During the agenda phase, when an outcome you voted for or predicted is resolved, you may exhaust this card to place 1 PDS from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: The Blessed Sanctum
subtitle: Yin Monument
ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card. Then, for every 2 infantry on this planet, move 1 of those infantry to any other planet you control.

name: Sector KVD-14
subtitle: Yssaril Monument
ability:
When another player plays an action card:

If that player controls 1 or more units in this or an adjacent system, you may gain 2 trade goods.

name: Anvil of Atlas
subtitle: Axis Monument
ability: When you produce 1 or more non-fighter ships in this sytem, gain 1 trade good.

name: Sleeping World
subtitle: Khrask Monument
ability: During ground combat in this system, this unit is treated as a structure and a ground force.

name: Gravelord's Keep
subtitle: Myko-Mentori Monument
ability: After each round of ground combat on this planet, if you have units in combat, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Jatta's Palace
subtitle: Cymiae Monument
ability: When another player activates this system they must discard 1 action card, if able.

name: Nightfall Fortress
subtitle: Li-Zho Monument
ability: When another player activates this system, remove 1 command token from this system or gain 1 command token.

name: Flotilla Cyclotron
subtitle: Dih-Mohn Monument
ability: After you activate a system, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the move value of ships in this system until the end of this tactical action.

name: Bounty Brokerage
subtitle: Vaden Monument
ability: When a player activates this system, you may place 2 of their control tokens on your faction sheet.

name: Corsairs' Cove
subtitle: Florzen Monument
ability: After each round of space combat in this system, if you have any fighters in combat, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcement in this system's space area.

name: Halls of Valor
subtitle: Ghemina Monument
ability: When you win a space combat while you are the active player, ready this planet.

name: Diplomatic Enclave
subtitle: Olradin Monument
ability: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the "Diplomacy" strategy card, ready this planet.

name: Ado Citadel
subtitle: Mirveda Monument
ability: During the first round of ground combat in this system, your opponent's units do not make combat rolls.

name: Mirrorforge
subtitle: Mortheus Monument
ability: Once per space combat, when a ship you control that has SUSTAIN DAMAGE is destroyed in this system, you may place 1 unit of that type in this system damaged from your reinforcements; trat unit cannot repair until after that space combat.

name: The Maw
subtitle: Nivyn Monument
ability:
Other players' ships cannot move out of ore through this system.
Your ships may treat this system as adjacent to the wound

name: New Phrad
subtitle: Rhodun Monument
ability: During space combat in this system, for each unit upgrade technology your opponent owns, apply +1 to each of your units' combat rolls.

name: AI Conclave
subtitle: Augurs Monument
ability: After you explore another planet, you may explore this planet.

name: Perdition Array
subtitle: Veldyr Monument
ability: During movement, hits produced by the SPACE CANNON abilities of your units in this system cannot be canceled.

name: Dawnstar HQ
subtitle: Tnelis Monument
ability: When you lose a ground combat on this planet, destroy each unit on this planet.

name: Drive Disruptor
subtitle: Vaylerian Monument
ability:
Other players cannot declare a retreat during combat in this system.
You may treat this system as adjacent to the active system when you retreat.

name: Independence Tower
subtitle: Free Systems Monument
ability: When a planet adjacent to this system is exhausted for influence, that planet produces 1 additional influence.

name: Jump Relay
subtitle: Celdauri Monument
ability: Ships you control in this system may treat this system as adjacent to each system that contains 1 or more of your space docks.

name: Debris Field
subtitle: Zelian Monument
ability: During the first round of space combat inthis system, cancel up to 2 hits produced against your units.

name: Shades' Den
subtitle: Kollecc Monument
ability: After movement, if this is the active system and contains no more than 1 other player's ships, you may place any of your captured units from your faction sheet into this system.

name: Zha'Ren Foundry
subtitle: Roh'Dhna Monument
ability: When you produce 1 or more units, you may treat up to 4 of those units as if you produced them on this planet instead.

name: Queen's Rest
subtitle: Kortali Monument
ability: At the start of each round of space combat in this system, repair 1 ship you control in this system.

name: Tucc Academy
subtitle: Bentor Monument
ability: When you pass, explore this planet twice.

name: Bannerhall
subtitle: Kjalengard Monument
ability: When a player wins a combat in or adjacent to this system, you and that player may each gain 1 command token.

name: Freehold Starport
subtitle: Nokar Monument
ability: Your ships may move out of this system, even if it contains 1 of your command tokens.

name: Twilight Throne
subtitle: Edyn Monument
ability: When you exhaust this planet for resources or influence, it produces an additional resource or influence for each law in play.

name: Forbidden Library
subtitle: Lanefir Monument
ability: Once per action, you may use the technology specialty of a planet in or adjacent to this system.

name: Polemarch's Hive
subtitle: Cheiran Monument
ability: This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to the number of structures you control in or adjacent to this system.

name: Kyro Reliquary
subtitle: Kyro Monument
ability:
This planet counts as a legendary planet with an attachment and a technology speciality of no type.
When this unit is destroyed, you must place it on a valid adjacent planet you control, if able.

name: Ghoti Anchorpoint
subtitle: Ghoti Monument
ability: At any time, you may chose to treat this system as being adjacent to your home system.

name: Wonell's Bastion
subtitle: Kolume Monument
ability: When this unit produces a hit against another player's ships, gain 1 command token.

name: Central Mining Hub
subtitle: Gledge Monument
ability: When a planet with an attachment is exhausted for resources in this or an adjacent system, that planet produces an additional resource.

name: Drahn Monument
subtitle: Drahn Monument
ability: At the beginning of your turn you may remove this unit from this planet and place it onto a different valid planet you control.
